availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Elizabeth Thompson Gulick in Pendleton County on March 25, 1856. Father of Julia A. Gulick, Laura B. Gulick, Nancy L. Gulick, Thomas J. Gulick, and Lewis T. Gulick. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 48.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #000272801, p. 147.
Find A Grave, "William Gulick (1829-1899)," Memorial #79186917, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/79186917 (accessed June 13, 2018).
